meeting_annotations.speaker: Matt Erdman

meeting_annotations.speaker: Ana Bento, Indiana University

meeting_annotations.transcript: Yeah, and then it I guess going back on that, then you're going to have dead ends. meeting_annotations.transcript: That's perversely cool when we think about spillovers because that happens every day. meeting_annotations.speaker: Matt Hopken (USDA-APHIS-NWRC)
meeting_annotations.transcript: Well, I also think another component of a transmission chain is um opportunity, which susceptibility plays into that, but also the overlapping of the pathogen, vector and host in both space and time.
